Focus group.ad_copy: Discover a spacious, modern apartment with integrated living spaces and a dedicated home office—perfect for remote work or study. Recently renovated and fully furnished with quality appliances and tasteful decor, this quiet retreat is located at the back of a main avenue building. Enjoy proximity to the country's top Medicine School, supermarkets, gyms, public transport, and popular dining spots. Ideal for medical students and young professionals seeking convenience and comfort. High-quality photos and a virtual tour are available. Find us on university bulletin boards, social media groups, local community boards, and popular rental websites in São Paulo. Move in hassle-free and experience the perfect blend of style and practicality.
